comments:

So it looks like 
com.ibm.etools.webedit.editor.actions.ComboUtil$1.controlResized is asking a 
disposed Composite to layout().  Since wsad lives several levels above swt I 
have no context here, or idea why this would happen.

Please log this report with wsad.  If the problem is occurring as a result of a 
platform inconsistency (eg.- an event firing difference) then they should log a 
report with swt containing a stand-alone swt-only example that shows the 
problem.
